# We can leave comments in here for each other, just ammend commends to the file instead of deleting comments using the below format;

# <name>; <comment> <date>
# <name>; <comment> <date>


# This repo is for learning how to use a repo along with the git commands within a Linux Ubuntu system. Do not edit the text above the coming line.
